title: Handle Fan Complaint About Long Lines
description: A fan emails customer support to complain about long lines at the concession stands during a recent game.

tasks.description: Identify the fan and the game they attended.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the fan's account and ticket history.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the fan's complaint and apologize for their negative experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a polite and empathetic response.

tasks.description: As a goodwill gesture, credit their account with a voucher for a free hot dog and soda for the next game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the voucher to the fan's account.
